text: Oblast Sports Complex "Metalist" (, commonly known as simply the Metalist Stadium) is a stadium in Kharkiv, Ukraine. The stadium was one of the venues for the UEFA Euro 2012. The stadium can hold 38,633 people. F.C. Metalist Kharkiv plays there. The stadium was first opened on September 12, 1926. The stadium's only renovation was on December 5, 2009, for the UEFA Euro 2012. Category:Football stadiums in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Ukraine Category:1926 establishments in Europe Category:1920s establishments in Ukraine
title: Metalist Stadium
